requests.name: CreateJson
requests.description: This is used to create JSON out of Raml
requests.data:
#%RAML 0.8
---
title: Test API
baseUri: http://www.google.com/
protocols: [HTTP]
version: 1
mediaType: application/json
documentation: 
  - title: The Description of the API
    content: |
      This is a test
/api/derp:
  displayName: GetDerp
  get:
    description: deeee
/api/derp/{id}:
  displayName: GetDerpById
  uriParameters: 
      id: 
        type: integer
        required: false
        description: 
        example: |
            
  get:
    description: 
/api/derp?value={value}&name={name}:
  displayName: CreateNewDerp
  uriParameters: 
      value: 
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 
        example: |
            
      name: 
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 
        example: |
            
  post:
    description: 
/api/tests:
  displayName:
  get:
    description: This gets the tests
    headers:
      Accept: 
        displayName: Accept
        example: application/json
        type: string
        description: This is the content type we want from the server
    responses:
      400:
        body:
          application/json: 
            schema: 
            example: |
                [bad request]
      200:
        body:
          application/hal+json: 
            schema: values
            example: |
                ['value1', 'value2']
      500:
        body:
          application/json: 
            schema: 
            example: |
                [internal server error]
  post:
    
    description: This inserts a test
    body:
      application/yaml: 
        formParameters: 
          testCase: 
            description  : The test
            type  : string
            required  : false
            example  :
    headers:
      Accept: 
        displayName: Accept
        example: application/json
        type: integer
        minimum: -1
        maximum: -2
        description: This is the content type we want from the server
    responses:
      400:
        body:
          application/json: 
            schema: 
            example: |
                [bad request]
      200:
        description: |
          This is the standard request back.
        body:
          application/json: 
            schema: 
            example: |
                [should be the location of this test]
      500:
        body:
          application/json: 
            schema: 
            example: |
                [internal server error]
/api/tests/{id}: #name: this
  displayName: 
  uriParameters: 
      id: 
        type: integer
        required: false
        description: id of the test
        example: |
            
  put:
    description: updates the test
    body:
      application/x-www-form-urlencoded:: 
        formParameters: 
          testCase: 
            description  : The test
            type  : string
            required  : false
            example  :
